entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near noon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then northwest 30 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
